mapper.sql: id as id , sort as sort , majoredId as majoredId , majoredCode as majoredCode , majoredName as majoredName , universityCode as universityCode , universityName as universityName , averageScore as averageScore , highestScore as highestScore , provinceId as provinceId , provinceName as provinceName , cityId as cityId , ciyName as ciyName , countyId as countyId , countyName as countyName , subject as subject , enrollBatch as enrollBatch , year as year
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_majored_score_line ( sort, majoredId, majoredCode, majoredName, universityCode, universityName, averageScore, highestScore, provinceId, provinceName, cityId, ciyName, countyId, countyName, subject, enrollBatch, year ) VALUES ( #{sort}, #{majoredId}, #{majoredCode}, #{majoredName}, #{universityCode}, #{universityName}, #{averageScore}, #{highestScore}, #{provinceId}, #{provinceName}, #{cityId}, #{ciyName}, #{countyId}, #{countyName}, #{subject}, #{enrollBatch}, #{year} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_majored_score_line
sort = #{sort},
majoredId = #{majoredId},
majoredCode = #{majoredCode},
majoredName = #{majoredName},
universityCode = #{universityCode},
universityName = #{universityName},
averageScore = #{averageScore},
highestScore = #{highestScore},
provinceId = #{provinceId},
provinceName = #{provinceName},
cityId = #{cityId},
ciyName = #{ciyName},
countyId = #{countyId},
countyName = #{countyName},
subject = #{subject},
enrollBatch = #{enrollBatch},
year = #{year},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_majored_score_line
sort = #{map.sort},
majoredId = #{map.majoredId},
majoredCode = #{map.majoredCode},
majoredName = #{map.majoredName},
universityCode = #{map.universityCode},
universityName = #{map.universityName},
averageScore = #{map.averageScore},
highestScore = #{map.highestScore},
provinceId = #{map.provinceId},
provinceName = #{map.provinceName},
cityId = #{map.cityId},
ciyName = #{map.ciyName},
countyId = #{map.countyId},
countyName = #{map.countyName},
subject = #{map.subject},
enrollBatch = #{map.enrollBatch},
year = #{map.year},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_majored_score_line ( sort, majoredId, majoredCode, majoredName, universityCode, universityName, averageScore, highestScore, provinceId, provinceName, cityId, ciyName, countyId, countyName, subject, enrollBatch, year ) VALUES ( #{map.sort}, #{map.majoredId}, #{map.majoredCode}, #{map.majoredName}, #{map.universityCode}, #{map.universityName}, #{map.averageScore}, #{map.highestScore}, #{map.provinceId}, #{map.provinceName}, #{map.cityId}, #{map.ciyName}, #{map.countyId}, #{map.countyName}, #{map.subject}, #{map.enrollBatch}, #{map.year} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_majored_score_line
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND sort like CONCAT('%', #{condition.sort} , '%')
AND majoredId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majoredId} , '%')
AND majoredCode like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majoredCode} , '%')
AND majoredName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.majoredName} , '%')
AND universityCode like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityCode} , '%')
AND universityName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.universityName} , '%')
AND averageScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.averageScore} , '%')
AND highestScore like CONCAT('%', #{condition.highestScore} , '%')
AND provinceId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.provinceId} , '%')
AND provinceName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.provinceName} , '%')
AND cityId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.cityId} , '%')
AND ciyName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.ciyName} , '%')
AND countyId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.countyId} , '%')
AND countyName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.countyName} , '%')
AND subject like CONCAT('%', #{condition.subject} , '%')
AND enrollBatch like CONCAT('%', #{condition.enrollBatch} , '%')
AND year like CONCAT('%', #{condition.year} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
